name: Agent Rooster
description:
Mission command to Agent Rooster!

You have been smuggled into the cargo hold of a ship belonging to the evil BIG - Blind Investment Group - and it is your job to get past the vile Mole Overseer and reach the terminal to secure important information!

To do this, you have a host of challenging mechanics at your disposal, like walking, jumping, and never-before-seen "shooting"!

Controls:

  • A and D to walk
  • W or Space to Jump
    • Double Jump needs to be unlocked
  • Shift to Dash (needs to be unlocked)
  • Left click to shoot
  • Use your mouse cursor to aim
  • Use the scroll wheel to swap weapons (more weapons can be unlocked)

Credits:

  • Team:
    • Centi Games
    • Crowley Astray
  • All assets were created by us, except the following:
    • Futuristic Small Space Ships SFX by fusehive
      • Airborne Spaceship Interior Ambience    [008048]
      • Fast Spaceship Engine Flying Forward Loop    [004274]
    • MMO Game Magic Fantasy Game SFX by Epicstockmedia
      • MMO_Game_Magic_Designed_Lightning_Loop_02
      • MMO_Game_Magic_Designed_Lightning_Loop_05

    Please note: MacOS and Linux build have not been tested.
